snippet.title: Freddy Fazbear Pizzeria Simulator - Now available on PS4, Switch and Xbox One
snippet.description:
ON CONSOLE
Playstation 4: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP5549-CUSA17984_00-FFPS000000000000
Xbox One: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/freddy-fazbears-pizzeria-simulator/9nj5vqgqh7k1
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/freddy-fazbears-pizzeria-simulator-switch/

ON MOBILE
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/fnaf-6-pizzeria-simulator/id1455781522
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.clickteam.freddyfazbearspizzeriasimulator

Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria Simulator puts you in charge of developing your own restaurant! 

Prospective franchise owners will start with opening their new Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria.  Purchase your initial attractions and set the decor. Make sure all the equipment is working correctly and open the doors. At the end of the business day you might have to stay late to handle paperwork and closing details. As owner this sometimes involves staying late. Once your done you can take the revenue you have earned and reinvest it back in to the restaurant. Fazbear Entertainment provided you all the tools and knowledge to run a safe and successful location. 

Fazbear Entertainment is not responsible for liability from any and all claims including negligence or accident, resulting in personal injury, accidents, or death from operation of Fazbear Pizzeria franchise.


Example: Static effect footage provided by freestockfootagearchive 

#FNaF​ #MadeWithFusion
